contactBlurb: I am a roofing EXPERT who is available to help you in any way possible. I have been in the industry for over 10 years and have seen all types of roofs. If you are interested at all in any of the services, call me immediately, for a quote or even just a yarn. When I get on the tools, I do not suffer fools.
p3Content1:
I am a motorcycle mechanic, avid rider, and I have been working on motorcycles for over 10 years. I can diagnose any problem with your motorcycle and fabricate any part that you need, or find it if not.

I have experience working on Harley Davidsons, Indian Motorcycles, Ducati, BMWs, Hondas, Kawasaki's and many more. I also work with electrical systems on motorcycles. I have rebuilt inline 4's and am currently working on my own tuning and forced induction system for a K7 GSXR. I offer my services not just as a reliable mechanic, but also a mentor of sorts.
secondaryContent: I have been a roofer for 12 years. I am the best roofer you will find in this town. I know my stuff, and if you need a new roof, or if you need any repairs done to your roof, then call me and I'll be right there.
secondaryContent1: Sam is Camera shy. Here's a gixxer logo.
supportingHeading: For every problem there is a solution. We provide professional services in different fields, including roofing and mechanical diagnosis. We are committed to making sure that you find the right man for the job, which is usually always me. We provide solutions to any problems that you may have, big, small, financial , hole in your roof, hole in your engine block, you name it.
titleBlurb: For every problem there is a solution. This is the philosophy Ellis Solutions stands by.
